pages.text: A redstone pen is a tool that you can use to make redstone a little more... compact, easier, and complicated at the same time! While it's not only one object, Redstone Pen is actually an entire mod! I highly suggest checking out their $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/redstone-pen)project page$() because it can do a far better job at explaining everything than I can!
